About us

Our Fix service provides you with a one-stop professional service for all of your auto needs. From electrical, to bodyworks and mechanical faults, we have got you covered.

Who we are!

Auto fixer is a Nigeria based automobile diagnostic company with Australian based highly skilled and experienced and qualified technicians, all our technicians are masters in their fields with qualifications from top colleges in Australia.

All our technicians have worked and are still working with the Australian top automotive manufacturers such as, Ford, Honda, Hyundai,vw,Audi,Mercedes, Toyota,Mazda etc.

We are focused on making our customers happy at all times with 1year warranty on any repairs done, autofixer is equipped with the latest technology to help do a proper diagnosis on your vehicle.

What is autofixer?

At AutoFixer, we believe that our service represents all of our customer's highest hopes and most stringent expectations for car service; that our company is the ultimate in convenience, friendly service, expertise and pricing that is both competitive and gives control to the customer. We do this through:

We specialize in every type of car

What ever your car issue is, we can provide you with all the answers you need to fix it yourself or guide your mechanic with.
